question: Which Indian city become the first city in the country to provide a helicopter taxi service?
explanation: Bengaluru will become the first city in the country to provide a helicopter taxi service. The service will be operated by Thumby Aviation Private Limited who have partnered with the Bangalore International Airport Limited to start the Heli Taxi service. It will initially be operated between Bengaluru's Kempegowda International Airport and the Electronics City area.
